text: thæcring brrda phu thi xyu nı hmu phwk cea thi han hlang hni nı wan thi sxng klum phechiyhna kan nan thæ cring chay txn tanghak thi thahı phlang phlad pi neuxngcak bang sing thi phwk khea di prakxb wi theanan læa næ nx nxallxhˌ kdi thrng xphay hı kæ phwk khea læw thæ cring xallxhˌ nan pen phuthrng xphaythosʹ phuthrng hnaknæn
